text: Good evening delegates, my name is Siddharth Bahu and currently I am pursuing my M.Tech
D.T. in Electronics and Rotary Design from Department of Electronics and Systems Engineering.
The reason why I chose this branch is because the curriculum of it prepares us for stepping
into the startup related to electronics and semiconductor industry which is a buzzing
domain nowadays.
Currently I don't have any kind of dream company though I want to be a startup consultant.
In future at any point of time I wish to have my own consultant firm which boosts other
startups in both technical and management ways.
I know it requires a lot of expertise and experiences and I am ready to harness it with my 3D i.e. Determination, Devotion and Dedication.
I am ready to explore the nuts and bolts of entrepreneurship Now talking about my leadership management and technical capabilities
So I took an initiative named Beyond Maths in my undergrad which is related to e-commerce.
You guys can type it in Google and the first website, the first link will refer you guys
to its website.
I would be happy to listen to your feedbacks.
And apart from it, I also was involved in student council as a sports secretary, parallelly
working and coordinating for some of the technical and cultural clubs.
And now talking about my hobbies, so I love to play outdoor sports and I utilize my leisure
time by watching test-offs and reading case studies.
So this is something about me and my aspirations.
So I would be happy to answer to any of your queries.
Thank you.
